module.name: gameCluedo
module.description: A simple dialog module allowing to play a sort of Cluedo game.
module.copypolicy: Released under the terms of the GNU GPL v2.0
module.description-long: Kleenex module developed for a single shot experiment of QA between a user and the system. The robot and the user have the goal to complete a set of statement with missing parts that are known by the other player.
